entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
